News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Solihull Moors
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National League home fixture against Solihull Moors has been named as Neil Hair
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Wayne Cartmel and Kieran Bailey with the fourth official being Lee Grimsey.

Ticket information for the game can be foundÂ here.
